near-future japan, dominated by evil beings and the presence of darkness.

the implicit rule of “mutual non-interference” between man and demon, which had been observed since ancient times, had started to come apart at the seams due to people falling down the path of heresy.
criminal organizations and corporations in which man and demon colluded operated in secret, and the era had descended into chaos.
however, people who tried to walk the path of righteousness were not powerless, either.
the government of the time had opposed the evils of man-demon heresy by organizing a group comprised of shinobi who could fight against the 『demons』.
people called them “taimanin”――
